Name: TripleBuilder
About the game: Triple Builder - Triple Builder is a typical three-match puzzle game. Build a building. - Score can be obtained by placing at least three buildings of the same level connected to the top, bottom, left, and right. Get a high score. - In 10 minutes, play the game smart to get the highest score possible. Explore - Once you've completed the game, you can save the city and tour it from the first person point of view.
Meta Title: TripleBuilder: Aug 10, 2021, Baek In Sun and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on TripleBuilder? Check out the release date (Aug 10, 2021), developer insights from Baek In Sun, and a complete game summary.
